availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Kemper Slaughter (Mercer County Broom Maker)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, broom maker. Kentucky native. Married to Judith Ann Maxey. Father of John M. Slaughter, Broom maker in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 724
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film 000191861, p. 32
Find A Grave, John Kemper Slaughter (October 19, 1823-August 22, 1904), Memorial #100144348, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100144348 (accessed August 20, 2019).
